articles.title: Oasis and Avalanche Lead 2025 Crypto Buzz as Blazpay ($BLAZ) Crypto Presale Opens at $0.006
articles.description: PANAMA CITY, Oct. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Blazpay ($BLAZ), an AI-powered DeFi platform, officially announced the launch of its Phase 1 crypto presale at $0.006 per token. The structured sale model introduces scarcity and urgency, with tokens allocated per phase and prices adjusting upward by up to 25% in the next round. The move positions Blazpay alongside established projects like Oasis (ROSE) and Avalanche (AVAX), capturing attention as one of the most talked-about launches this October.
